REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0743 reute d f BC-<FMD-INC>-IN-MERGER-A 04-07 0046

TEXT.TITLE: <FMD INC> IN MERGER AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: FMD Inc said it has agreed to acquire Bankers Protective Financial Corp for 28,836,000 common shares, subject to approval by the Texas State Board of Insurance. Bankers Protective is a life insurance company based in Texas. Reuter
